features: Locks in Hydration: GK Hair Moisturizing Conditioner Hydrates Hair from root to tip as part of the Daily Moisture Renewal system. It removes frizz while adding smoothness to your hair with static reduction making them easily manageable, eventually help you maintain your natural shape of the hair by helping you maintain frizz and locking in the moisture at the same time.

Color Protection: GK Conditioner is designed especially for Color Treated, Dry Damaged, Curly Hair to gently deep clean and stimulate the scalp, preserve color and nourish and rejuvenate the hair follicles. Hair feels lighter, cleaner, and more buoyant.

Natural Ingredients: GK Hair Conditioner is hypoallergenic products that works for all hair types. Conditioner infuse with Keratin an anti-aging protein leaving hair moisturized & soft. Less prone to breakage, split ends, and thinning fine hair by absorbing essential nutrients and vitamins.

Additional Shine: This Magical Conditioner is infused with keratin which main benefits are nourishing and deep conditioning. This helps your hair look shiny, smooth and silky. It also fights frizz, tames flyaway, and provides true protection against heat damage caused by styling tools like a straightening iron or blowout.

Made in the USA: GK Hair Conditioner is made of using the highest quality Ingredients This is most recommended to use after GK Hair the Best Keratin Treatment. It does not contain alcohol, parabens or sulfates and is Cruelty Free.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GK MOISTURIZING CONDITIONER Oils, Plant & Grain Extracts GKhair Moisturizing Conditioner Protects hair, provides natural moisture, strengthens with keratin, increases elasticity, and reinforces color duration. Nourishes with proteins and vitamins for healthy, manageable, silky-smooth locks.

Say Goodbye to Dryness Intense Moisturize Deep Cleansing Color Protection Frizz-Taming Nourishing Juvexin Infused Intense Moisturize Deep Cleansing Color Protection Frizz-Taming Nourishing Juvexin Infused Intense Moisturize Deep Cleansing Color Protection Frizz-Taming Nourishing Juvexin Infused Intense Moisturize Deep Cleansing Color Protection Frizz-Taming Nourishing Juvexin Infused
Previous page Cleanse: Moisturizing Shampoo, Condition: Conditioner Protect: Argan Oil Serum. Style: Hair Cream Next page 1 Regimen for Damaged hair 2 Silky Locks in Seconds 3 Unleash Hairs Potential

WHICH CONDITIONER IS RIGHT FOR YOU? Moisturizing shampoo Transform your hair with a moisturizing shampoo that hydrates, adds shine, and fights frizz. Get healthy-looking, silky-smooth locks with every wash. Balancing Shampoo Get rid of oily hair! It cleanses and balances your natural pH levels, leaving hair smooth, shiny, and fresh. Say goodbye to greasy hair! Shield Shampoo Protect and enhance your hair's beauty with UV/UVA and color protection. Shield your hair from environmental damage with ease. The best Experience the best. Prevents breakage, reduces styling time, smooths and strengthens, and keeps hair soft and frizz-free.

Can I use Balancing Moisturizing on color-treated hair? Yes! Moisturizing Conditioner is safe to use on color-treated hair and helps in prolonging the vibrance of it. Does Moisturizing Conditioner contain sulfates? No. Moisturizing Conditioner is a 100% sulfate-free formula and contains no harsh chemicals such as parabens, glutens, phthalates, and DEA/TEA. What is the difference between Moisturizing Conditioner and Balancing Conditioner? Moisturizing Conditioner is developed for dry, frizzy and damaged hair whereas Balancing Conditioner is suitable for oil-prone hair. Can I use Moisturizing Conditioner after getting a keratin treatment? Yes. Moisturizing Conditioner comes from the range of No. 1 worldwide Hair Taming System and improves the results of a keratin treatment. Which product works best with Moisturizing Conditioner? Moisturizing Conditioner delivers exceptional results with Moisturizing Shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent customer service
reviews.reviewText: I had a problem with my order. The product is wonderful but I received a defective pump. Scott with GK Hair contacted me and sent me a brand new new product. The customer service was amazing and the response time was prompt. This is an excellent company providing excellent products! Will continue to be a return customer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for straight and curly hair!
reviews.reviewText: I have used many, many conditioners, but this one continues to be my favorite. I first used it as originally intended, which wass to maintain my hair between keratin treatments. And my hair continues to love this conditioner in it's curly/coily state! My curls form perfectly. Also, hair is so soft, manageable and shiny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great value for what this is. Usually is so much more expensive at the salon and a much smaller quantity but this is wonderful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2021
reviews.reviewText: My wife says it’s the best and nothing else can compare. Great product. Makes her hair silky smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What is going on with GK?
reviews.reviewText: I love this product but I ordered the liter size of the moisturizing conditioner for colored hair. The box said for color protection the bottle did not. So I ordered another one. Same thing happened. Both are going back! I then ordered a smaller size and it was fine. So get your act together!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like the moisturizing shampoo better
reviews.reviewText: Arrived safely and well packaged. I thought I ordered what I usually use, the GK moisturizing shampoo, but actually I ordered this one. It's ok, my hair feels clean, just not as soft a with the moisturizing shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Relaxes and leaves my coarse/thick hair shiny and flowing
reviews.reviewText: I have just below shoulder length thick, coarse, wavy/straight/curly hair. My background is spaniard/mexican/native american. I've tried many different brands of deep conditioners, but, the GKhair product shas made a substantial difference. After blow drying and straightening my hair with a flat iron, it is very shiny, soft and flows freely. I just love this conditioner! I have since purchased the moisturizing shampoo & conditioner/Hair Creme/Hair Serum, plus, GKhair has sent me several free products with my orders! This is absolutely awesome! One of my favorites is the leave-in hair cream. I for sure have found my new hair care products and will continue to purchase as needed. A big thank you to a sweet nail technician in Florida who recommended GK Hair to me. She had such beautiful, shiny ethnic hair (like me) and when I asked her which products she used, she told me only GKhair. Very happy with the products!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The product is g reat makes my hair so soft I'd absolutely tell friends to buy this product
reviews.reviewText: I love how it makes my hair soft ibhave very dry hair Nd this product works great for me
Non lascerò più questo balsamo…se lasciato qualche minuto in più ha l’effetto di una maschera
Prodotto fantastico!!!! Sia lo shampoo che la crema e uso anche le gocce sui capelli umidi prima del phon….mi trovo proprio bene

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: My 3rd 1000ML bottle. I haven’t bought any other hair product since i started using GK. if you keratin your hair. Or use hair color as frequently as every month. You should use GK shampoo and conditioner. Highly recommend
Ottimo prodotto rende i capelli morbidi, luminosi e docili da pettinare. Molto buona anche la profumazione.Consegna puntuale, confezionamento perfetto.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 21, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Excellent but only wish it was more affordable
